meanings.definition: A tropical American tree, Bixa orellana, of the spurge family, having heart-shaped leaves and pink flowers.
meanings.sent1: The annatto tree in the garden has beautiful heart-shaped leaves.
meanings.sent2: The pink flowers of the annatto tree brighten up the yard.
meanings.sent3: The annatto tree decided to wear heart-shaped leaves for a fancy party.
meanings.sent4: The annatto tree stood out in the forest like a pink flower among greens.
meanings.sent5: The annatto tree's heart-shaped leaves fluttered in the breeze, catching everyone's eye.

meanings.definition: A yellowish-red dye obtained from the pulp enclosing the seeds of this tree, used as a coloring agent in food and cosmetics.
meanings.sent1: The chef added annatto to the dish to give it a vibrant color.
meanings.sent2: Annatto is commonly used in cosmetics for its natural coloring properties.
meanings.sent3: The annatto dye spilled and turned the kitchen into a yellowish-red mess.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as if painted with annatto dye.
meanings.sent5: The sunset painted the sky with shades of annatto, creating a stunning view.
